title: 12-18-17 Year End Chat with Pat on Pat Sloan's Talk show for American Patchwork and Quilting Radio
description:
At the end of every year I my own show.

I talk about some favorite books that came out this year and why I love them, it seems to have been the year of 'blue'
With so many great shows, you might have missed a few of my favorites.. So I selected 4 shows through the year to highlight
Curious what American Patchwork magazine & Me are hosting in 2018, that's here too!
Plus a fun Q&A from my Facebook Group, no holds bared on this one!
================
Subscribe to American Patchwork & Quilting at www.allpeoplequilt.com/getmagazine.
Visit American Patchwork & Quilting at www.allpeoplequilt.com.
Visit host Pat Sloan at www.patsloan.com.
================
BONUS for our podcast subscribers! Get 50% off a digital quilt pattern of your choice in our online shop. Visit apqshop.com, and use coupon code PODCAST at checkout.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
